definition: great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain

sentences.english: The third part analyzes the characteristic of Taixu"s thoughts on life."
sentences.chinese: 第二部分分析了太虚佛教人生观的主要内容。

sentences.english: But it seems that the messages are too late and too weak.
sentences.chinese: 不过这消息来得太迟也太虚了。

sentences.english: Third, ghosts and gods are the Qi's attribute.
sentences.chinese: 鬼神则是气在太虚状态下的属性。

sentences.english: Celestials live in the great void.

definition: time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
Lord of profound heaven, major Daoist deity/aka Black Tortoise 玄武 or Black heavenly emperor 玄天上帝
Wuji county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊地區|石家庄地区[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1 di4 qu1], Hebei/The Promise (name of film by Chen Kaige)
underground palace of ghouls, e.g. Asgard of Scandinavian mythology
Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
